title: Usaba Dangsil Ritual (Half-day)
overview: Experience the sacred Usaba Dangsil ritual, a unique Balinese ceremony in Tenganan village.

stops.description: Arrive and observe the Usaba Dangsil ritual.

title: Usaba Dangsil & Village Tour (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring the Usaba Dangsil ritual and Tenganan's unique culture.

stops.description: Arrive and witness the Usaba Dangsil ritual.
Explore Tenganan village and its traditions.
Participate in a workshop or discussion about Balinese rituals.
